activities: Engine Yard provides cloud services to customers located in the European Union and Switzerland who may, or whose end users may, store personal data on servers in the United States.  Outside of billing data, Engine Yard does not collect such data directly from individuals and does not own, control, use or direct the disclosure or transmission to third parties.  Such data is owned and controlled by Engine Yard's customers or its customers' end users. Engine Yard acts only as a processor on behalf of its customers as to any personal data of EU and Swiss residents. Engine Yard does not determine the purposes, means of collecting, or uses of such data.  Engine Yard is the data controller only with respect to information, if any, that it collects directly from customers located in the European Union or Switzerland.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
